Name: Agent Focus: Grace
Desc: Use it to obtain the Agent or unlock the Agent's Mindscapes.
Desc2:
Snapshots from Grace's daily life and from in combat, recording important moments before and after she became an Agent.
These images also provide insights into her fighting style and favorite weapons, helping to better understand her strengths.

There's a faint watermark visible on the image, as if the "kid" who took the photo for Grace signed it.
